title: California Wildfires - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/4/19
itunes:title: California Wildfires - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/4/19
description:
George Noory and author Robert Kerbeck explore the wave of destructive wildfires that are burning across California, dangerous chemicals that may be getting released into the air, and his own experience defending his home from fires in Malibu.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
